# AUDIO::PLAY_AMBIENT_SPEECH_FROM_POSITION_NATIVE

## Summary
Plays a line of dialogue from a position through a global entity so there is no ped required

## Parameters
* **STRING** context: Speech context to be spoken
* **STRING** voiceName: There is no ped so you need to specify which voice to use Position - Where the speech will be played from Params - name of the speechParam rave game object to look to for various details on how it should be played
* **FLOAT** positionX
* **FLOAT** positionY
* **FLOAT** positionZ
* **STRING** speechParams

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Full list of speeches and voices names by DurtyFree: https://github.com/DurtyFree/gta-v-data-dumps/blob/master/speeches.json
